file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-71-02-02 - CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the maintenance practices for the CVR underwater locator beacon (ULB). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON ALL 23-71-02-900-801-A (ULB) - RESTORE CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON ALL 23-71-02-960-801-A ♦ (ULB) BATTERY - DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-71-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-02-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON (ULB) - RESTORE A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to restore the CVR underwater locator beacon (ULB). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOV- AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400 AL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTAL- AMM TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A/400 LATION Honeywell CMM 23-70-44 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform, hydraulic ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 23-71-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore CVR Underwater Locator Beacon SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Remove the ULB ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400). (2) Do the test of the ULB. To do this, refer to the last revision of Honeywell CMM 23-70-44. NOTE: If the test results are not satisfactory or the ULB is at or near the expiration date marked on the ULB, send the ULB back to the manufacturer for servicing. Refer to the last revision of Honeywell CMM 23-70-44. (3) Install the ULB ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A/400). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the access platform. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 23-71-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-71-02-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON (ULB) BATTERY - DISCARD A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to discard the CVR underwater locator beacon (ULB). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOV- AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400 AL CVR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTAL- AMM TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A/400 LATION Honeywell CMM 23-70-44 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform, hydraulic ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 23-71-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Discard CVR Underwater Locator Beacon Battery SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the ULB ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-000-801-A/400). (2) Send the ULB back to the manufacturer for disposal. Refer to the last revision of Honeywell CMM 23-70-44. (3) Install the ULB ( AMM TASK 23-71-02-400-801-A/400). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Close access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the access platform. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 23-71-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
